workshoptitle: How to Download the Oracle JDK

tutorials.title: Introduction
tutorials.description: Find the best JDK download for your use case.

tutorials.title: Licensing Information
tutorials.description: The Oracle JDK is made available under different licenses, depending on the version.

tutorials.title: Manually from My Oracle Support
tutorials.description: Customers can download the JDK, components, and BPRs from My Oracle Support.

tutorials.title: Manually from Oracle.com
tutorials.description: Anyone can download manually from Oracle.com.

tutorials.title: Manually from Oracle Software Delivery Cloud
tutorials.description: Anyone with an Oracle account can download from Software Delivery Cloud.

tutorials.title: Automatically from Oracle.com
tutorials.description: Anyone can automate downloads from Oracle.com.

tutorials.title: Automatically or Manually with Java Management Service on Oracle Cloud Infrastructure
tutorials.description: OCI users can use Java Management Service to download the JDK.
